ygData.subject: Erud vs Felwithe
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats a thought... I shepherded a novice Erudite to Freeport over the weekend, it was my first time in Erud and Tox.... Erud is very beautiful! I port to
ygData.messageBody:
Thats a thought...

I shepherded a novice Erudite to Freeport over the weekend, it was my first time in Erud and Tox.... Erud is very beautiful! I port to Felwithe to do my selling now, but my faction with merchants there is apprehensive. Ive only found 1 thing that will help that faction, releasing elf prisoners in Crushbone.

Are there any other ways to get faction with Felwithe merchants, Erudin merchants or as last resort, Kelethin?

Shannyn



>>> Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...> 11/30/99 09:21AM >>>
From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>

According to PHAEDRA WHITLOCK:
> Im here. Fighting my way out of Lvl 21. Or trying to... So few good places to hunt, so few people to group with. *sighs*
>
> Piecemealing it is taking awhile. Spent a morning camping Emperor Crush and Dvinn, afternon at the Gorge slaying Eyes, Evening Aviaks. So boring, and this stuff will be green at 22 I suspect (well, not the aviaks, but those are Soooooo camped).

Honestly, I don't fully remember how I spent level 21, but, if I think I got
this right, I was hunting gnolls at Highhold, mainly for the good faction hits.
Most of these were still blue, so they gave good xp, at least until people
started to appear and camp them too.
(unlike orc side, gnoll side cannot support more than three-four people)

--
